languages.text: Каждая атака против {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарда{/g} дает ему +1 уровень эффекта знак стойкости. Каждый уровень повышает его {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 1 вплоть до 15. Все союзники в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда получают 1/5 от этого {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g}. Если к началу {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} авангарда его оставшееся значение {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} меньше, чем число знаков стойкости, или вовсе равно 0, то временное здоровье авангарда становится равным числу его знаков стойкости.

Each attack against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If at the start of the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the remaining number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.
languages.original_text: Каждая атака против {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарда{/g} дает ему +1 уровень эффекта знак стойкости. Каждый уровень повышает его {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 1 вплоть до 15. Все союзники в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда получают 1/5 от этого {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g}. Если к началу {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} авангарда его оставшееся значение {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} меньше, чем число знаков стойкости, или вовсе равно 0, то временное здоровье авангарда становится равным числу его знаков стойкости.

traits.locale_text:
Each attack against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguard}Vanguard{/g} grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If at the start of the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the remaining number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of their turn.

Each attack against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If at the start of the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the remaining number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

Each attack against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If at the start of the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the remaining number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

languages.text:
Jeder Angriff gegen die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} addiert ihr +1 Stapel von Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit hinzu. Jeder Stapel erhöht ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} um +1, bis maximal +15. Sämtliche Verbündeten der Vorhut innerhalb eines Radius von 2-Felder-Radius erlangen 1/5 dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}.
Wenn zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} der Vorhut die verbleibende Anzahl an {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g} geringer ist als die Anzahl von Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit, wird diese Anzahl angeglichen, auch wenn die Vorhut zu Beginn ihres Zugs keine temporären Wunden hat.
languages.original_text:
Each attack against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If at the start of the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the remaining number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

traits.locale_text:
Jeder Angriff gegen die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguard}Vorhut{/g} addiert ihr +1 Stapel von Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit hinzu. Jede Addition erhöht ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} um +1, bis maximal +15. Sämtliche Verbündeten der Vorhut innerhalb eines Radius von 2-Felder-Radius erlangen 1/5 dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}.
Wenn zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} der Vorhut die verbleibende Anzahl an {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g} geringer ist als die Anzahl von Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit, wird diese Anzahl angeglichen, auch wenn die Vorhut zu Beginn ihres Zugs keine temporären {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat.

languages.text:
Chaque attaque menée contre le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} lui confère +1 cumul de Guide inflexible. Chaque cumul accroît sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de +1, jusqu'à un maximum de +15. Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du patrouilleur bénéficient de 1/5e de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
Si au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du patrouilleur, le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} restantes est inférieur au nombre de cumuls de Guide inflexible, il est alors égal au nombre de ces cumuls, même si le patrouilleur ne possède pas de blessures temporaires au début de son tour.
languages.original_text:
Each attack against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If at the start of the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the remaining number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

Chaque attaque menée contre le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguard}Patrouilleur{/g} lui confère +1 cumul de Guide Inflexible. Chaque cumul accroît sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de +1, jusqu'à un maximum de +15. languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}每次攻击都会获得1层“不灭明光”效果。每层效果提供+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，最多+15。先锋周围2格内的所有盟友会获得1/5的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}效果。
当先锋的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，若先锋没有{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，或临时生命值低于“不灭明光”层数，则立刻获得临时生命值，总值等同于“不灭明光”层数。
languages.original_text:
Each attack against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If at the start of the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the remaining number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguard}先锋{/g}每次攻击都会获得1层“不灭明光”效果。每层效果提供+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，最多+15。先锋周围2格内的所有盟友会获得1/5的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}效果。
当先锋的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，若先锋没有{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，或临时生命值低于“不灭明光”层数，则立刻获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，总值等同于“不灭明光”层数。

languages.original_text: Each attack against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguard}Vanguard{/g} grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. If at the start of the Vanguard's turn the remaining number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporary wounds{/g} is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

languages.text:
Cada ataque efectuado contra el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} le otorga +1 acumulación de Dechado de firmeza. Cada acumulación aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} en +1, hasta un máximo de +15. Todos los aliados situados en un radio de 2 casillas en torno al vanguardia ganan un 1/5 de esa {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g}.
Si, al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del vanguardia, el número de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} restantes es inferior a la cantidad de acumulaciones de Dechado de firmeza, pasa a ser igual a esa cantidad de acumulaciones incluso aunque el vanguardia no tenga heridas temporales al comienzo de su turno.
languages.original_text:
Each attack against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If at the start of the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the remaining number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

traits.locale_text:
Cada ataque efectuado contra el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguard}vanguardia{/g} le otorga +1 acumulación de Dechado de firmeza. Cada acumulación aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} en +1, hasta un máximo de +15. Todos los aliados situados en un radio de 2 casillas en torno al vanguardia ganan un 1/5 de esa {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g}.
Si, al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del vanguardia, el número de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} restantes es inferior a la cantidad de acumulaciones de Dechado de firmeza, pasa a ser igual a esa cantidad de acumulaciones incluso aunque el vanguardia no tenga {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales al comienzo de su turno.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}に攻撃するたび、不屈の標を1スタック得る。スタックごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が1増加する（最大15）。ヴァンガードの周囲2セル以内のすべての味方は、その{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の1/5を得る。
ヴァンガードの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な負傷{/g}の残量が不屈の標のスタック数より少ない場合、ヴァンガードに一時体力がない場合でも、ターンの開始時にそのスタックと同じ量になる。
languages.original_text:
Each attack against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If at the start of the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the remaining number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguard}ヴァンガード{/g}に攻撃するたび、不屈の標を1スタック得る。スタックごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が1増加する（最大15）。ヴァンガードの周囲2セル以内のすべての味方は、その{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の1/5を得る。
ヴァンガードの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な負傷{/g}の残量が不屈の標のスタック数より少ない場合、ヴァンガードに一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}がない場合でも、ターンの開始時にそのスタックと同じ量になる。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü'ye{/g} karşı yapılan her saldırı ona +1 yılmaz fener birikimi kazandırır. Her bir birikim, {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerini 1 puan (maksimum 15) artırır. Öncü'nün çevresindeki 2 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimler, bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusun{/g} 1/5'ini kazanır.
Öncü'nün {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında kalan geçici sağlık puanı; yılmaz fener birikimi sayısından düşükse, turun başında hiç geçici sağlık puanı olmasa bile, bu birikimlerin miktarına eşitlenir.
languages.original_text:
Each attack against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If at the start of the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the remaining number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.
